componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

We hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to inform you that your initial set of Credit Defense Reports are ready for your review. These documents are for your safekeeping to provide audit support, if ever needed.

Next Steps:

1. Review the reports for technical accuracy, available via this secure encrypted SendSafely LINK. Please respond to confirm that these documents are technically accurate or provide changes within 2 weeks of this email.

  • Company Overview
  • Methodology
(TIER TWO)

We would like to provide additional Credit Defense Services to support the R&D tax credits being claimed. This final step is recommended to support the amount of R&D tax credits being claimed.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• Project Activity Summary Questionnaire - Please complete the attached questionnaire for one major R&D project for tax year 20XX, as a deeper dive for audit preparedness. You may share the attached questionnaire with your technical leads for completion.
  • Documentation to support your claim. Please provide 3-5 documents related to the project referenced in the Project Activity Summary Questionnaire (see attached 4-Part PDF for samples).
  • Please upload the completed questionnaire and supporting documents by first signing in to the Gusto R&D Tax Credit platform  HERE, and then through the link provided  HERE. (Log in your credentials through the Gusto Single Sign On or username & password).
  • We ask that you provide the requested information by XX XX, 2022 or let us know if you prefer to decline this additional service, which does not exclude you from filing your R&D tax credits.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Should you prefer to provide your responses verbally, please schedule a brief call with us HERE.

Best regards,

(TIER THREE, INTERVIEW REQUEST)

2. We would like to provide additional Credit Defense Services to support the R&D tax credits. This final step is optional, but highly recommended to support the amount of R&D tax credits being claimed. To proceed, please schedule a 30 minute meeting with our team HERE. 

We kindly request that you confirm receipt of this email by XX XX, 20XX and let us know if you would like to proceed with this additional service or if you choose to decline, which does not exclude you from filing your R&D tax credits.

As always, let us know if you have any questions.

Kind regards,

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
(TIER THREE, MATRIX ONLY)

2. We would like to provide additional Credit Defense Services to support the R&D tax credits. This final step is optional, but highly recommended to support the amount of R&D tax credits being claimed. To proceed, please schedule a 30 minute meeting with our Credit Defense Team HERE and we will walk you through the process of completing a Matrix Survey, which details the main R&D projects for tax year 20XX and the percentage of R&D time per development stage.

We kindly respond to this email by XX XX, 20XX to confirm your preference to proceed with this additional service by: a) scheduling an interview, b) self-complete the R&D Matrix Survey (instructions will be provided), or c) advise if you choose to decline this additional service.

As always, let us know if you have any questions.

 

Best Regards,
R&D Tax Credit Team

Want to talk? Our R&D Specialists are always here to help. Schedule a Call.

Have questions? Email us at support@credits.gusto.com
